attributes.action: ignore the calls to give David Beckham a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although he has been a good servant to the sport over the past ten years, there are far more deserving individuals worthy of this honour before Beckham.  A knighthood should be honoured for a lifetime's contribution, not a decade's worth.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
